name: Siliglass Pumice Stone Callus Remover for Feet, Elbows, Hands, and Knees, Spain Made - 2 in 1 Pedicure Exfoliator and Scrubber for Rough, Hard Skin (1 Pack)
short_description: Premium Siliglass Pumice Stone – Crafted with premium siliglass that works more effectively at softening hard calluses, dead skin buildup, and corns this foot pumice stone helps you maintain softer, smoother skin all on those tough or rugged areas.

Dual-Sided Skin Exfoliator – This is a unique pumice stone for women and men in that it features a rough exfoliation side to remove hard, dry, or thick skin patches and a soft fine pumice stone side that lets you buff and polish it to a natural vibrance.

Washable, Reusable, and Hygienic – Our high-quality callus pumice stone provides long-lasting reusability to keep your skin soft and supple and can simply be washed and reused again and again to provide maximum value each and every day.

Enjoy Softer, Smoother, Vibrant Skin – Running our pumice stone for feet callus remover over your skin not only helps keep it supple and radiant it can leave you feeling more comfortable and confident in your favorite shoes or outfits.

Target Feet, Hands, Elbows, and More – More than a foot pumice stone you can use this double-sided skin exfoliator on other areas where dead skin or hard, cracked skin begin to build up including the hands, heels, elbows, knees, and more.
